content:
# The movement command to reach the stone furnace executed successfully. Now, I will proceed to insert 5 iron ore into the furnace for smelting.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=furnace_info, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=furnace_info, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of coal into the furnace for fuel.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
